EMD.description: A necessary step to reduce any given data into a collection of intrinsic mode functions (IMF) to which the Hilbert spectral analysis can be applied.

procons.pros: A necessary step to reduce any given data into a collection of intrinsic mode functions (IMF) to which the Hilbert spectral analysis can be applied.
procons.cons: A necessary step to reduce any given data into a collection of intrinsic mode functions (IMF) to which the Hilbert spectral analysis can be applied.

STFT.description: A Fourier-related transform used to determine the sinusoidal frequency and phase content of local sections of a signal as it changes over time.
